settings.text:
Other Ways to Reach Us

Choose the method that works best for you. We're committed to providing excellent customer service through all channels.

settings.heading: Live Chat
settings.description: Get instant help from our support team through our live chat feature available on every page.

settings.heading: Email Support
settings.description: Send us detailed questions or concerns via email and we'll respond within 24 hours.

settings.heading: Phone Support
settings.description: Speak directly with our customer service representatives during business hours.

settings.heading: Social Media
settings.description: Follow us on social media for updates, tips, and quick responses to your questions.

settings.heading: Common Questions
settings.subheading: Before contacting us, check if your question is answered below

settings.question: How quickly do you respond to inquiries?
settings.answer: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 4 hours during business hours. For urgent matters, please call our phone number directly.

settings.question: Can I schedule a consultation?
settings.answer: Yes! We offer free consultations to discuss your needs in detail. Use the contact form above to request a consultation or call us directly.

settings.question: Do you offer technical support?
settings.answer: Absolutely. Our technical support team can help with product setup, troubleshooting, and any technical questions you may have.
